BUY.description: Buy a piece of ship equipment

FITTING_IS_INCLUDED_IN_THE_PRICE.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship

FLAVOUR_0_BODY.message: Hi! My name is {name} and I'm selling off my {equipment} from my old rusty bucket. I want {price} for it.

FLAVOUR_0_TITLE.message: FOR SALE: Special offer, selling one {equipment}.

FLAVOUR_1_BODY.message: Hi! My name is {name}. I have an almost brand new {equipment} which I'm selling for just {price}.

FLAVOUR_1_TITLE.message: SELLING: Practically unused {equipment}, at an affordable price!

FLAVOUR_2_BODY.message: Merhabalar! Ben {name} ve sadece {price} karşılığında sizin olabilecek çok iyi bir {equipment} ekipmanım var.

FLAVOUR_2_TITLE.message: SELLING: One {equipment}, for a reasonable price!

FLAVOUR_3_BODY.message: Hello! I have an extra {equipment} which I need to get off my hands, my asking price is {price}.

FLAVOUR_3_TITLE.message: FOR SALE: One {equipment}, in good condition.

FLAVOUR_4_BODY.message: Merhaba! {price} karşılığında sizin olabilecek fazladan bir {equipment} ekipmanımız var.

FLAVOUR_4_TITLE.message: FOR SALE: Leftover {equipment}, in fine condition.

FLAVOUR_5_BODY.message: Merhabalar! Benim eski {equipment} ekipmanımı almak ister misiniz? Bana iyi hizmet etti, ancak şimdi yenilemiş bulunuyorum ve ona ihtiyacım yok. Fiyatı {price}.

FLAVOUR_5_TITLE.message: FOR SALE: Old {equipment}, in working condition.

HOW_DO_I_FITT_IT.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship
